data.title: The EU’s two-tier encryption vision is digital feudalism
data.description:
EU's ProtectEU mandates on-device scanning before encryption, creating a two-tier security system where states encrypt while citizens are surveilled. Digital feudalism codified.
source: https://cointelegraph.com/news/eu-encryption-digital-feudalism?utm_source=rss_feed&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=rss_partner_inbound

data.title: Shiba Inu Open Interest Crash To 2024 Levels, Is It Game Over For The Meme Coin?
data.description:
The Shiba Inu open interest has been one of the worst-performing among the top cryptocurrencies by market cap in the year 2025. While there has been a general increase in open interest across the likes of Bitcoin and Ethereum, pulling the market up with them, Shiba Inu has not followed this trajectory. Instead, the meme coin’s open interest has crashed significantly, making new 2025 lows in the process. Shiba Inu Open Interest Crashes Below $100 Million At the start of the year, on January 16, 2025, the Shiba Inu open interest had hit a new all-time high above $519 million despite the SHIB price action remaining relatively muted
source: https://www.newsbtc.com/shiba-inu/shiba-inu-open-interest-crash/

data.title: KITE announces its token economics: total supply of 10 billion tokens, with an initial circulating supply of 18%.
data.description: According to Binance's announcement, the KITE token economics has been officially released. The total KITE token supply is 10 billion, with an initial circulating supply of 1.8 billion, representing 18% of the total. Of these, 150 million are allocated to Launchpool rewards, representing 1.5% of the total. According to the specific allocation plan disclosed by KITE: 48% is allocated to the ecosystem and community to incentivize community and ecosystem development; 20% is allocated to modules supporting the supply and demand of intelligent agent-related services such as computing power, models, data, and applications; 20% is allocated to the team, advisors, and early contributors to incentivize core members and strategic supporters; and 12% is allocated to investors, targeting institutional and individual investors who participated in project financing.

data.title: Introducing Kite (KITE) on Binance Launchpool: Farm KITE by Staking BNB, FDUSD, and USDC
data.description: Key Takeaways:Launchpool farming starts: November 1, 2025, at 00:00 (UTC)Binance listing date: November 3, 2025, at 13:00 (UTC)Supported staking assets: BNB, FDUSD, and USDCTotal rewards: 150 million KITE (1.5% of total supply)Initial circulating supply: 1.8 billion KITE (18% of total supply)Seed Tag applied; listing fee: 0Binance has officially announced the 71st project on Binance Launchpool — Kite (KITE), an AI-powered blockchain for payments that aims to accelerate transaction efficiency using decentralized machine intelligence.KITE Launchpool farming begins on November 1, 2025, at 00:00 (UTC), allowing users to lock BNB, FDUSD, and USDC to earn KITE token rewards over a two-day farming period ending November 2, 2025, at 23:59 (UTC).Following the farming phase, Binance will list KITE on November 3, 2025, at 13:00 (UTC), opening trading for KITE/USDT, KITE/USDC, KITE/BNB, and KITE/TRY pairs.⚠️ Note: Any claims to sell KITE before this official listing are false and may indicate scams. Users should verify information via Binance’s official channels only.KITE Launchpool DetailsDetailSpecificationToken NameKite (KITE)Total Supply10,000,000,000 KITELaunchpool Rewards150,000,000 KITE (1.5% of supply)Additional Marketing Allocation50,000,000 KITE (distributed in campaigns six months post-listing)Initial Circulating Supply1,800,000,000 KITE (18%)NetworksBNB Smart Chain, Ethereum, AvalancheSmart Contract Address0x904567252D8F48555b7447c67dCA23F0372E16beListing Fee0KYC RequiredYes (per Launchpool Terms)Launchpool Farming Pools and AllocationPoolReward AllocationHourly Hard Cap per UserBNB Pool127,500,000 KITE (85%)265,625 KITEFDUSD Pool7,500,000 KITE (5%)15,625 KITEUSDC Pool15,000,000 KITE (10%)31,250 KITEFarming Period:November 1, 2025 (00:00 UTC) – November 2, 2025 (23:59 UTC)Daily Distribution Example:Total: 75,000,000 KITE per dayBNB Pool: 63,750,000 KITEFDUSD Pool: 3,750,000 KITEUSDC Pool: 7,500,000 KITETrading and Post-Listing InformationTrading starts: November 3, 2025, at 13:00 (UTC)Pairs: KITE/USDT, KITE/USDC, KITE/BNB, KITE/TRYSeed Tag: Applied to KITEAvailable on Binance Alpha: KITE will initially be tradable on Binance Alpha, though it will no longer be showcased there after spot trading begins.About Kite (KITE)Kite is a multi-chain AI payment blockchain designed to integrate smart data routing, real-time settlement, and adaptive liquidity protocols for businesses and developers. The project aims to merge AI decision layers with on-chain payment execution, enhancing both transaction speed and scalability.A full Binance Research report on KITE will be released within 48 hours of this announcement.

data.title: Binance Launchpool launches its 71st project, KITE.
data.description: According to the official announcement, Binance Launchpool will list Kite (KITE), the 71st project. Users can mine KITE by investing BNB, FDUSD, and USDC starting at 00:00 (UTC) on November 1, 2025, for a period of two days. Binance will list KITE on November 3, 2025, at 13:00 (UTC) and open trading pairs KITE/USDT, KITE/USDC, KITE/BNB, and KITE/TRY. (This news item was generated with AI assistance.)

data.title: Four.meme Integrates deBridge for Enhanced Cross-Chain Exchange
data.description:
According to BlockBeats, Four.meme has announced the integration of the cross-chain protocol deBridge, launching a new cross-chain exchange feature. This integration allows users to directly exchange tokens from other supported chains into BNB and other BSC assets via the Four.meme platform.

This collaboration not only enhances Four.meme's cross-chain ecosystem but also introduces increased external chain asset liquidity to the BNB chain, offering users more efficient cross-chain asset allocation options.

data.title: An address went long 7929 ETH on Hyperliquid with 25x leverage.
data.description: According to Lookonchain monitoring, a newly created wallet (0x6988...6cEB) deposited $5.18 million USDC into Hyperliquid and established a long position on ETH with 25x leverage, holding 7,929 ETH, worth $30.32 million, with a liquidation price of $3,280.2.

data.title: zCloak Network launches an AI-human collaborative multi-signature wallet based on the x402 protocol, achieving a breakthrough in on-chain payments for intelligent agents.
data.description: zCloak Network today announced the official launch of its multi-signature wallet system supporting the x402 protocol. This system innovatively enables seamless collaboration between AI agents and humans in on-chain asset operations, marking a significant advancement for AI as a multi-signature party in real-world x402 protocol asset transfers. On the zCloak.Money multi-signature platform, the AI ​​agent can act as an independent signer, autonomously initiating USDC payment requests based on the x402 protocol. After the AI ​​completes the signature conforming to the EIP-3009 specification on the server side, the transaction, carrying the "x402" identifier, is pushed to the pending list of human collaborators. After manual review and secondary signature, the payment process is complete. In the future, AI can assist in handling various on-chain stablecoin payment scenarios, including computing resource procurement, API call settlement, and data service payments, improving enterprise resource allocation efficiency and automation levels. zCloak.Money is a fully on-chain self-custodied enterprise multisignature wallet built by zCloak Network, dedicated to providing institutional users with secure, transparent, and auditable on-chain asset management solutions.
